p.br:
9420 Putney Drive
PO Box 300
Durham, CA 95938

div.p:
Durham Unified School District is committed to equal opportunity for all individuals in education and in employment and does not discriminate on the basis of actual or perceived ancestry, age, color, disability, gender, gender identity, gender expression, national origin, immigration status, race or ethnicity, religion, sex, sexual orientation, pregnancy, parental/marital or family status, primary language, social class, geographical location, or association with a person or group with one or more of these actual or perceived characteristics. The Board prohibits, at any district school or school activity, unlawful discrimination, harassment, intimidation, and bullying of any student based on the protected characteristics named above.
504 Coordinator Marilyn Bertolucci, Director of Special Education | mbertolucci@durhamunified.org | (530) 895-4697 x246
Title V, Title II and Title IX Coordinator Joanne Parsley, Interim Superintendent of DUSD | jparsley@durhamunified.org | (530) 895-4675
